author: Minifig290
title: Great Little Easter Gift
review:
Before I start I'd like to wish everyone a Happy Easter, now this set is a great set with some useful elements.

Minifigure

As this set resolves around this little fellow let's talk about him first, He reuses the series 7 cmf bunny ears with the same color, and his legs are just simple plain white Minifigure legs with no detail sadly. Now his torso has a new and exclusive print on it with printing for a jacket and his furry belly, and his head has on it two of his teeth showing (his face is not duel sided for those wandering).

Accessories

Now one thing I like about this little box promo compared to the Iconic Chick and Gingerbread man from 2016 is that there are two accessories for extra play, these are a paint brush with a light blue print on the end instead of the normal green print and an egg with a pattern that goes all around the part which was first released unprinted in 2016 with the Angry Birds theme

Display Box (packaging)

Unlike most sets nowadays the box for the set can be used as a display case as well and is detailed perfectly. the front has a door with a bunny face on it and door handle next to the door there is a light and flowery detail, Each side has a window so does the back. The rear window shows two little builds for a duck and chick.

______________________________________________

Overall

Overall for a freebie this set is great and well made in a great and reusable box but if your going to pay the prices at Sainsbury's  which is £4 it dose seem a bit pricey for me but that my opinion, and also the availability of this set isn't the greatest as it is only at Lego Shop and a few Sainsbury's stores in the UK and Ireland.

Pros- Exclusive parts and prints, great box

Cons- Price, Availability

author: Puidwen
title: An excellent Easter minifig
review: This is a very cute minifig.  Taking it out of the package one of the first things you will notice is how well the print is done. (Buckteeth!)  Lego nailed the Easter Coloring on it.  In terms of overall appearance it's is an excellent looking minfig, only behind my  Tie fighter pilot.  One thing that did surprise me is that it only had one face print, something i notice becuse his headgear pop off while i took him out of the box.  Lego has made the packaging seem like part of the set.  The box art is very nice.  I actually have the box siting beside my other sets.
